Class MusicalInstrumentDAO

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.musicalInstrument.MusicalInstrumentDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<MusicalInstrument>
public class MusicalInstrumentDAO extends Object implements DAO<MusicalInstrument>
Data Access Object (DAO) for MusicalInstrument entities. Provides CRUD operations and queries related to musical instruments in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MusicalInstrumentDAO()
    Constructs a MusicalInstrumentDAO using the default DatabaseManager instance.
    MusicalInstrumentDAO(DatabaseManager dbManager)
    Constructs a MusicalInstrumentDAO with a provided DatabaseManager.

      Returns:
